articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A makes a big, welcome change for shiny hunters - The Verge
articles.description: Unlike in previous Pokémon games, shiny pokémon in Legends: Z-A won’t disappear when you walk away, making it harder to miss out on rare catches.
